name: Fundamental Environmental Skills
description: The practical, interdisciplinary and controversial nature of environmental issues, as well as the uncertainty that surrounds measures to address them demand mastery of a particular range of skills by environmental students. This course teaches the fundamental research, analysis and presentation skills required for effective environmental work.
exclusions: GGR271H1 (taken in 2010-11 or after); INI223H1 (2005-06 academic year and before)
